sen.j: コンクリート造の大法輪塔1階には多数のだるまを展示、2階には南太平洋方面の戦没者の位牌が英霊殿に、映画関係者がキネマ殿に、それぞれ祭祀される。
sen.e: Many daruma dolls are displayed on the first floor of Daihorin-to (tower) constructed of concrete; mortuary tablets for victims of the Pacific War particularly in the South Pacific were enshrined in Eireiden on the second floor of the Shuseido; Kinema Hall was dedicated to people in the film industry.

sen.e: Many daruma dolls are displayed on the first floor of Daihorin-to (tower), which is constructed of concrete; mortuary tablets for victims of the Pacific War (particularly the South Pacific) are enshrined in Eireiden on the second floor of the Shuseido, and Kinema Hall is dedicated to people in the film industry.
